Based on style, the work shown can be identified as a folio from which of the following illuminated manuscripts?

choices.label: The Vienna Genesis from early Byzantine Europe
The Lindisfarne Gospels from early medieval (Hiberno Saxon) Europe
The Golden Haggadah from late medieval Spain
The Codex Mendoza from the Viceroyalty of New Spain

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
